net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Class RequiredValueValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.AbstractValidator
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.RequiredValueValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public class RequiredValueValidator
extends AbstractValidator
    Validates that a value is required. The validation only occurs if a component is shown and enabled.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
